question: Right to Education Act, 2009 mandates 25 pc free seats to the poor in which among the following schools of India?
option2: Government Schools and Government Aided Private Schools only
option3: Government Schools, Government aided Private Schools and Private unaided schools
answer: Government Schools, Government aided Private Schools and Private unaided schools
explanation: Right to Education Act, 2009 mandates 25 pc free seats to the poor in Government Schools, Government aided Private Schools and Private unaided schools.
